price: Allah telah menjanjikan kepada orang-orang yang beriman dan yang beramal saleh, (bahwa) untuk mereka ampunan dan pahala yang besar.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
